episodes.title: Vita mia
episodes.plot: With Don Pietro in hiding, Ciro sets about building a new drug empire with Salvatore Conte.

episodes.title: Lacrime e sangue
episodes.plot: It is one year since the formation of Salvatore Conte's Alliance, and having established a new drug empire in Central America, Genny reunites with his father.

episodes.title: Mea culpa
episodes.plot: Conte recklessly takes revenge against one of his own men, upon which Ciro capitalizes, further weakening their fragile alliance.

episodes.title: Profumo di iena
episodes.plot: Ciro looks to cut a deal with Gennaro when new faces on the streets start causing problems. Meanwhile, Don Pietro returns to Naples.

episodes.title: Occhi negli occhi
episodes.plot: Ciro sets up a parley with Gennaro in order to avoid a full-on gang war. Gennaro agrees, but with strict orders from his father.

episodes.title: 'O Track
episodes.plot: Don Pietro is not happy with Genny and decides to confront him on his actions.

episodes.title: Il Principe e il Nano
episodes.plot: O'Principe enjoys his rise to power as the head of the new breed of Camorristi, but his celebrity and attitude soon makes him enemies.

episodes.title: Divide et impera
episodes.plot: Following a shocking assassination, Ciro sets out to find the killer while preventing tensions from boiling over.

episodes.title: Sette anni
episodes.plot: Marinella is distraught to hear that Raffaele is getting out of prison. Ciro calls a meeting to divide the turf, but not everybody is happy with their cut.

episodes.title: Fantasmi
episodes.plot: An increasingly isolated Ciro finds a possible way to sniff out Pietro's hiding place, while the Alliance call some of his decisions into question.

episodes.title: Nella gioia e nel dolore
episodes.plot: Pietro prepares to take back control once and for all, as Ciro decides to go into hiding. Meanwhile in Rome, Avitable suffers a complication in his business.

episodes.title: La fine del giorno
episodes.plot: As Ciro prepares for all-out war with the Savastano clan, Pietro finds a way to deal his enemy a devastating blow.
